text.industrialization_overdrive.coils_p: Runs Pyrolyse Oven in batches of up to %d at %s the EU cost.
text.industrialization_overdrive.machine: Batch size and cost is determined by coil used.
text.industrialization_overdrive.multi_p: Batch size is determined by the amount of machines provided to it.
Insert electric crafting multiblocks to run in parallel.
Can run recipes of any electric crafting multiblock provided to it in batches.
